name: Phrenologist
description: A practitioner who claims to read character from skull shapes; adventurers can seek personality insights, debunk pseudoscience, or uncover hidden motives.
atmosphere: The practice has a mysterious, pseudo-scientific atmosphere with the scent of medical supplies and the sound of careful examination. The air carries the weight of questionable science and the essential nature of character analysis, while the atmosphere crackles with the tension of truth versus deception and the mysteries of human personality.
